name: Zendesk
overview: View flag variations served to Zendesk ticket reporters without ever leaving Zendesk.
description: Zendesk is a service-first CRM company that builds software designed to improve customer relationships. Our Zendesk app gives you and your team members a read-only view of flag variations served to your customers without leaving Zendesk, thus dramatically shortening the time to close tickets.
author: LaunchDarkly
